span.p: The United States has now surpassed China and Italy with the most COVID-19 Cases. This page is designed to keep our school community current as this pandemic unfolds while providing to you helpful resources. Any questions can be sent directly to Superintendent, Dr. James J. Lavender at Lavenderj@krsd.org.

Kingsway & South Harrison transitioned from a traditioanl teaching and learning model to virtual learning environment on Monday, March 16th. Adequate technology is a critical component of this program and Kignsway has deployed over 600 Chromebooks to students in need. If questions arise regarding technology, please email suppport@krsd.org or call (856) 467-3300, Ext. 4256 for direct support.
To learn more about our Virtual Learning Program, click here: Virtual Learning Program
We will continue to monitor and improve our Virtual Learning Program and notify our school community of updates accordingly.
